properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM TB_COMMUNITY_SCRAP WHERE USER_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT CM.COMMUNITY_NO , COMMUNITY_TITLE , SCRAP_DATE FROM TB_COMMUNITY_SCRAP CS JOIN TB_COMMUNITY CM ON (CS.COMMUNITY_NO = CM.COMMUNITY_NO) WHERE COMMUNITY_STATUS = 'Y' AND CS.USER_NO = ? ORDER BY SCRAP_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
